author: Patricia Hernandez
title: Medical masks are one of Animal Crossing’s hottest looks
description: While the release of Animal Crossing: New Horizons has been hailed as a retreat from the harsh realities of 2020, when a pandemic is ravaging the world, in actuality players are often wearing reminders of what goes on in real life. Medical masks are some of t…
content: Image: Nintendo EPD/Nintendo via Sofia Lillo A digital accessory that has become a worldwide symbol The public narrative around Animal Crossing: New Horizons is that the slice-of-life game couldn’t come at a better time. With folks cooped up inside to avoid C… [+5642 chars]
